'''Subrosium''' is a Quest Item obtained during the [[Bygones Times Like Dust Passing]] Quest in the [[Interlude Chapter]] Archon Quest.

==Location==
The ore can be found north of the lake at the foot of [[Mt. Tianheng]], behind a boulder.
